tasks.title: ‚úÖ Mission Control Setup Complete
tasks.description:
Mission Control has been deployed and configured.

**How it works:**
1. Create tasks here or drag existing to columns
2. Move to **In Progress** ‚Üí Clawson automatically starts working
3. Clawson updates progress, marks subtasks done
4. Task moves to **Review** when complete
5. Approve or send back for rework

comments.author: Clawson
comments.text: Setup completed Feb 5, 2026. Dashboard live at massdwell.github.io/mission-control

tasks.title: Complete MassDwell Finish Portal ‚Äî 17 Categories

Split Wall Color into Standard + Accent
